content:
At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom around the world, and we couldn’t do this without hiring the best people. We’re a group of hard-working overachievers who are deeply focused on building the future of finance and Web3 for our users across the globe, whether they’re trading, storing, staking or using crypto. Know those people who always lead the group project? That’s us.
There are a few things we look for across all hires we make at Coinbase, regardless of role or team. First, we look for candidates who will thrive in a culture like ours, where we default to trust, embrace feedback, and disrupt ourselves. Second, we expect all employees to commit to our mission-focused approach to our work. Finally, we seek people who are excited to learn about and live crypto, because those are the folks who enjoy the intense moments in our sprint and recharge work culture. We’re a remote-first company looking to hire the absolute best talent all over the world.
Ready to #LiveCrypto? Who you are:

You’ve got positive energy. You’re optimistic about the future and determined to get there. 
You’re never tired of learning. You want to be a pro in bleeding edge tech like DeFi, NFTs, DAOs, and Web 3.0. 
You appreciate direct communication. You’re both an active communicator and an eager listener - because let’s face it, you can’t have one without the other. You’re cool with candid feedback and see every setback as an opportunity to grow.
You can pivot on the fly. Crypto is constantly evolving, so our priorities do, too. What you worked on last month may not be what you work on today, and that excites you. You’re not looking for a boring job.
You have a “can do” attitude. Our teams create high-quality work on quick timelines. Owning a problem doesn’t scare you, but rather empowers you to take 100% responsibility for achieving our mission.
You want to be part of a winning team. We’re stronger together, and you’re a person who embraces being pushed out of your comfort zone. 
As Senior Art Director in Coinbase’s Creative Studio, you are at the forefront of the most dynamic space in creative marketing. The team operates at the intersection of onchain art, culture, community, technology, and finance. Reporting to our Creative Studio’s Group Creative Director, your remit is to embrace every opportunity to build and foster excitement for Coinbase product launches across a range of areas from advanced trading to institutional investing. You’ll be at the center of the action, crafting creative and design solutions for our biggest product launches. You’ll be extremely hands-on, leveraging your motion and design skills to prototype your thinking in a work culture that embraces ideas and creativity over decks and consensus.
You’ll partner with internal creatives, strategists, creative producers, marketers, and operations leads to develop and deliver industry-leading creative that breaks through and connects deeply with its audience. Your work will help artfully articulate the vision for the future crypto economy, and thoughtfully show how our products are differentiated from others in the space.
To do all of this you’ll need a background launching world-class brands & products across all media, with heavy experience designing and developing motion-forward concepts that make digital product landscapes look beautiful.
Above all, you will lead by example by making the most of every opportunity to develop breakthrough creative, and you’ll share your knowledge with our growing in-house Creative Studio, helping bolster the skills of creatives from diverse brand backgrounds. 
What you’ll be doing

Foster and grow excitement for Coinbase products through work that is beautifully crafted, breakthrough, and conceptually excellent.
Partner deeply with product marketing leads to deliver on a creative workflow that is nimble and proactive in nature.
Jump on every opportunity to refine, evolve, and grow the brand. 

What we look for

6+ years experience as a creative practitioner, preferably as a designer in a high functioning, creatively excellent team environment with in-house tech experience.
A rich portfolio of hands-on developed, product-forward creative work for top tier brands.
A strategic point of view matched with proven hands-on creative craft.
